Using the cache for better performance

The Problem

The Problem

  • The CPU executes instructions very fast
  • The data arrives to the CPU very slowly

The Observation

“When a byte is read, it's likely that a byte near it will be read next.”

The Solution

  1. Read “chunks” of memory at once
  2. Store chunks in smaller, faster memories
  3. Try to read from the faster memories first
L1 cache reference                    0.5 ns
L2 cache reference                    7   ns    14x L1
Main memory reference               100   ns    20x L2, 200x L1
Disk seek                    10,000,000   ns
Source: https://gist.github.com/jboner/2841832
